Articles.Content: Hello! i am CRITAWAKETS form location(not real)Gmod tower but i moved to kerbin anyways i am kinda new to KSP actually i can do a space station but no mun landings.

Welcome to the forums!

Since you're a new player, feel free to ask questions if you get stuck anywhere, or to check out some of the tutorials, especially those listed in the Drawing Board (conveniently linked in my signature). Hope you make it to the Mun eventually -- that first landing always sticks with you.

Enjoy!
Welcome! Do you play TF2 too? It would be great to meet another Tf2er.
Tf2 was my first FPS and one of my favorite games (third place in my top 3 favorite games KSP is number one)
